# IPropertyPaneOptions Interface

The options to create a pane.

## Properties

### **direction**
`direction: LayoutDirection;`

Layout direction for sub panes

Type: *LayoutDirection*

### **title**
`title: string;`

Localized title of the property pane

Type: *string*
